explanation: [0-0] In an indoor setting, a young man in a black T-shirt stands in front of a grey table. On the right side of the table is a red bucket. The man in the black T-shirt holds the edge of the bucket with his right hand, his mouth wide open, looking at the table. On the table is a large glass bowl with the English caption "Me when I want Ice Cream:" in black letters on a white background above it.

[0-3] First, the man in the black T-shirt pours ice cream from the bucket into the bowl, spilling a chunk of ice cream onto the table to the right. The scene switches, the caption disappears, and a man with a beard wearing a blue T-shirt sits at a white table with a black and white checkered plate on it. The man in the blue T-shirt holds a cup of ice cream in his right hand. In the background, some sneakers can be seen in a transparent shoebox. The man in the blue T-shirt looks ahead and pours the ice cream into the black and white checkered plate.
